snippet: Stephen Strasburg struck out 13 in six innings, Bryce Harper homered, and the Washington Nationals beat the Boston Red Sox, 7-4, for the franchise’s first victory at Fenway Park.
lead_paragraph: Stephen Strasburg struck out 13 in six innings, Bryce Harper homered, and the Washington Nationals beat the Boston Red Sox, 7-4, for the franchise’s first victory at Fenway Park.

headline.seo: Strasburg Fans 13 to Help Nationals Win at Fenway
headline.main: Strasburg Fans 13 to Help Nationals Win at Fenway
